creator: ctalluri@netnumber.com
text:
All the functions (createElementNS, getElementsByTagNameNS..) that uses 
Namespaces don't work on Sun Solaris. 

When I launch the application the process enters in these functions and
doesn't seems to get out off the function. Same code works on Windows 2000

Tried with 1.4.0 and 1.4.3 having same problem
